title: Sakkarai Nilave Lyrics Youth
stanzas:
Sakkarai Nilave Song Lyrics From Youth
#ManiSharma #HarishRagavendra #Vairamuthu

Sakkarai Nilave pen nilave
kaanum podhe karaindhaye
nimmadhi illai
yaen illai
nee illaye... (2)

manam pachchai
thannithaan penne
adhai pattra
vaithadhun kannae

en vazhkai ennum
kaattai erithu
kulir kaaindhaai
kodumai penne

kavaidhai paadina kangal
kadhal pesina kaigal
kadaisiyil ellaam poigal
en pinju nenju thaangumaa.

Sarkkarai Nilave pen nilave
kaanum podhe karaindhaye
nimmadhi illai
yaen illai
nee illaye...

kadhal endra ondru
adhu kadavul pola
unarathaane mudiyum
adhil uruvam illai

kaayam kanda idhayam
oru kuzhandai pola
vaayai moodi azhume
solla vaarthai illai

anbae un punnagaiellaam
adi nenjil semithaen
kannae un punnagaiellaam
kanneeraai urugiyadhe

vellai sirippugal
un thavaraa
adhil kollai ponadhu
en thavaraa

pirindhu sendradhu
un thavara
adhai purindhu kondadhu
en thavara

aann kanneer parugum
pennin idhayam
sadhayalla kallin
suvaraa

kavaidhai paadina kangal
kadhal pesina kaigal
kadaisiyil ellaam poigal
en pinju nenju thaangumaa.

November maadha malai
naan nanaiven endren.
enakkum kooda nanaithal
miga pudikkum endraai

mottai maadi nilavil
naan kulippen endren
enakum kooda andha kuliyal
miga pudikkum endraai

sugamaana kural yaar endraal
Sushilaa-vin kural endren
enakkum andha kuralil yedho
mayakkam ena nee sonnaai.

kangal moodiya pudhar silai
en kanavil varuvadhu
pudikkum endren

thayakkam enbadhe
siridhum indri
adhu enakkum enakkum
thaan pudikkum endraai

adi unakkum unakkum
ellaam pudikka
ennai yaen
pudikkaadhendraai

kavaidhai paadina kangal
kadhal pesina kaigal
kadaisiyil ellaam poigal
en pinju nenju thaangumaa.
